suggestions.title: Simple Pasta with Tomato Sauce
suggestions.description: Quick and easy pasta dish using pantry staples
steps: Boil water and cook pasta according to package instructions
Heat tomato sauce in a pan
Add garlic and simmer for 5 minutes
Drain pasta and mix with sauce
suggestions.disclaimer: Nutritional information is an estimate only. Consult a nutritionist for accurate values.

suggestions.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
suggestions.description: Healthy and colorful vegetable stir fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok or large pan
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes
Cook for another 5 minutes until vegetables are tender
